articles.title: Sunspot AR3738 releases X-class solar flare triggering radio blackouts in Australia and Japan - WION
articles.description: Sun released another set of solar flares on Saturday and the explosion was captured by NASA's Solar Dynamics Observatory from space. The X-class flare, the most powerful class of solar flare, was released from Sunspot AR3738. The solar flares resulted in shor…
